snippet.title: THE RUNNERS | A Desperate Race Against Time | Full Movie
snippet.description:
A young woman disappears after crossing paths with a criminal network.
Her brother has only days to bring her home.

When Ryan’s teenage sister disappears after crossing paths with a ruthless criminal operation, he knows the clock is already working against him. With help hard to come by and danger at every turn, Ryan is forced into a relentless pursuit across city streets and desert roads. As powerful forces close in, bringing her home becomes a fight against time — and against everything standing in his way.

Director: Joey Loomis, Micah Lyons
Cast: Micah Lyons, Tom Sizemore, Glenn Morshower.
© Published under license.
#TheRunners #FullMovie #ActionThriller #Rescue #Suspense
